sentences.en: At daybreak our machine guns opened fire.
sentences.cn: 黎明时,我们的机关枪开火了.

sentences.en: At daybreak the farmer rose and fed the horses and cows.
sentences.cn: 黎明时农民起身去喂牛马.

sentences.en: At daybreak the wind became pretty strong again, but was capricious.
sentences.cn: 黎明时分,风又大了起来, 然而风向不定.

sentences.en: By this time it was daybreak.
Daybreak found us on a cold, clammy ship.
sentences.cn: 天亮时我们发现自己呆在一条冰冷黏湿的船上。

sentences.en: It was daybreak before Fitzpiers and Suke Damson re - entered Little Hintock.
sentences.cn: 天大亮后,菲茨比尔斯和苏柯·丹逊才回到小辛托克.

sentences.en: One day he went to the seashore before daybreak.
sentences.cn: 一天黎明前他来到海滨.

sentences.en: Pedro got up every morning before daybreak.
sentences.cn: 佩德罗每天早上天还没亮就起床了。

sentences.en: The birds, chirping relentlessly, woke us up at daybreak.
sentences.cn: 破晓时鸟儿不断吱吱地叫, 把我们吵醒了.

sentences.en: The fields are stirring with life before daybreak.
sentences.cn: 天没亮,田间就已一片活跃.

sentences.en: The fire was completely overcome by daybreak.
sentences.cn: 到天亮时,火势完全控制住了.

sentences.en: The rain left off at daybreak.
The wind awoke me before daybreak.
sentences.cn: 天还没亮,就被风刮醒了.

sentences.en: The wind blew hard all night but let up at daybreak.
sentences.cn: 整个晚上风刮很厉害,但到破晓时风势减弱了.

sentences.en: We arrived in Cairo at daybreak.
sentences.cn: 拂晓时分我们抵达开罗。
我们是在黎明前出发的。

trans.tran_en: the time of day when light first appears
